title: Celsius Estate Settles With Series B Holders Over Proceeds of GK8 Sale
description: Mike Novogratz’s Galaxy Digital purchased self-custody platform GK8 from Celsius in December as part of bankruptcy proceedings.

title: Revolutionizing DeFi: Polkadot Leads the Way at Permissionless II
description: At the fourth Decoded conference, Wood used an analogy to illustrate his vision, comparing Polkadot’s exploration path to Ethereum. Wood envisions Polkadot as a computer with multiple cores, where specific cores are reserved for parachains. Gavin Wood, the founder of Polkadot, suggests a major restructuring of the network’s resource allocation system, commonly referred to as [...]

title: Crypto Game-Changer: Aave Unleashes GHO Stablecoin on Ethereum Mainnet!
description: Aave has already generated over $2.19 million worth of GHO as it strives to transform the stablecoin market. Aave’s introduction of the GHO stablecoin on the Ethereum mainnet signifies a significant achievement within the DeFi sector.  Aave, a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform, recently introduced its latest stablecoin, GHO, on the Ethereum mainnet. GHO is a [...]
